name: Victory Blade Rivals
description:
Create a team of 7 using most characters from the Victory Blade Series. Battle your way through 30 different enemies to win the tournament. These battles gradually get more harder. 

Note - This game is not canon and it doesn't link into the story at all. This is a spin off

★ Introducing the Victory Blade Style. Use Powerful Special Moves

★ 24 Characters to choose from. Create a team of 7 

★ Play as any of these 24 characters
